languages.text: "Пожелать удачи. Дела вы с Пустотным братством вести {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}избегаете{/d}, но... Может, все изменится в будущем? Когда вернетесь с трюмом, ломящимся от трофеев, найдите меня в "Амасекусе". Выпивка будет с меня".

"To wish you good luck. You've {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}avoided{/d} doing business with the Fellowship of the Void, but... perhaps that may change in the future? When you're back and your hold is bursting with trophies, you can find me at the Amasecus. Drinks are on me."
languages.original_text: "Пожелать удачи. Дела вы с Пустотным братством вести {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}избегаете{/d}, но... Может, все изменится в будущем? Когда вернетесь с трюмом, ломящимся от трофеев, найдите меня в "Амасекусе". Выпивка будет с меня".

traits.locale_text: "To wish you good luck. You've avoided doing business with the Fellowship of the Void, but... perhaps that may change in the future? When you're back and your hold is bursting with trophies, you can find me at the Amasecus. Drinks are on me."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

traits.locale_text: "To wish you good luck. You've {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}avoided{/d} doing business with the Fellowship of the Void, but... perhaps that may change in the future? When you're back and your hold is bursting with trophies, you can find me at the Amasecus. Drinks are on me."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: “当然是来祝你好运的啦。你一直{d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}不想和虚空协联做生意{/d}，不过……说不定以后会改主意？等你带着满满一船的战利品回来之后，你可以来烈酒修会找我，到时候我请客。”
languages.original_text: "To wish you good luck. You've {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}avoided{/d} doing business with the Fellowship of the Void, but... perhaps that may change in the future? When you're back and your hold is bursting with trophies, you can find me at the Amasecus. Drinks are on me."

traits.locale_text: “当然是来祝你好运的啦。你一直不想和虚空协联做生意，不过……说不定以后会改主意？等你带着满满一船的战利品回来之后，你可以来烈酒修会找我，到时候我请客。”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「陛下の幸運を願おうと思ってね。陛下は虚空の仲間とのビジネスを、{d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}避けてきた{/d}が…もしかすると、将来的には変わるのではないかね？お戻りの際にトロフィーを沢山お持ちでしたら、是非アマセックで私を見つけてください。おごりますよ」
languages.original_text: "To wish you good luck. You've {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}avoided{/d} doing business with the Fellowship of the Void, but... perhaps that may change in the future? When you're back and your hold is bursting with trophies, you can find me at the Amasecus. Drinks are on me."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下の幸運を願おうと思ってね。陛下は虚空の仲間とのビジネスを、{d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}避けてきた{/d}が…もしかすると、将来的には変わるのではないかね？お戻りの際にトロフィーを沢山お持ちでしたら、是非アマセックで私を見つけてください。おごりますよ」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «Para desearle buena suerte. Ha {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}evitado{/d} hacer negocios con la Hermandad del Vacío, pero... ¿eso podría cambiar en el futuro? Cuando esté de vuelta y su bodega esté repleta de trofeos, puede encontrarme en el Amasecus. Invitaré yo».
languages.original_text: "To wish you good luck. You've {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}avoided{/d} doing business with the Fellowship of the Void, but... perhaps that may change in the future? When you're back and your hold is bursting with trophies, you can find me at the Amasecus. Drinks are on me."

traits.locale_text: «Para desearle buena suerte. Ha evitado hacer negocios con la Hermandad del Vacío, pero... ¿eso podría cambiar en el futuro? Cuando esté de vuelta y su bodega esté repleta de trofeos, puede encontrarme en el Amasecus. Invitaré yo».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Um Euch Glück zu wünschen. Ihr habt es zwar {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}vermieden{/d}, mit den Gefährten der Leere Geschäfte zu machen, aber ... vielleicht ändert sich das in Zukunft ja? Wenn Ihr zurück seid und Euer Lagerraum vor Trophäen platzt, findet Ihr mich im Amasecus. Die Getränke gehen auf mich."
languages.original_text: "To wish you good luck. You've {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}avoided{/d} doing business with the Fellowship of the Void, but... perhaps that may change in the future? When you're back and your hold is bursting with trophies, you can find me at the Amasecus. Drinks are on me."

traits.locale_text: "Um Euch Glück zu wünschen. Ihr habt es zwar vermieden, mit den Gefährten der Leere Geschäfte zu machen, aber ... vielleicht ändert sich das in Zukunft ja? Wenn Ihr zurück seid und Euer Lagerraum vor Trophäen platzt, findet Ihr mich im Amasecus. Die Getränke gehen auf mich."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « Seulement pour vous souhaiter bonne chance. Jusqu'ici, vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}évité{/d} de faire affaire avec la Communauté du vide, mais qui sait ce que nous réserve l'avenir... Quand vous reviendrez avec vos cales remplies à ras bord de trophées, retrouvez-moi à l'Amasecus. Je vous paierai un coup. »
languages.original_text: "To wish you good luck. You've {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}avoided{/d} doing business with the Fellowship of the Void, but... perhaps that may change in the future? When you're back and your hold is bursting with trophies, you can find me at the Amasecus. Drinks are on me."

traits.locale_text: « Seulement pour vous souhaiter bonne chance. Jusqu'ici, vous avez évité de faire affaire avec la Communauté du vide, mais qui sait ce que nous réserve l'avenir... Quand vous reviendrez avec vos cales remplies à ras bord de trophées, retrouvez-moi à l'Amasecus. Je vous paierai un coup. »
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "İyi şans dilemeye. Uçsuz Kardeşliği ile {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}iş yapmamayı{/d} seçtin ama belki de bu durum gelecekte değişir... Depoların ganimetlerle dolu bir şekilde geri döndüğünde beni Amasekus'ta bulabilirsin. İçkiler benden."
languages.original_text: "To wish you good luck. You've {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}avoided{/d} doing business with the Fellowship of the Void, but... perhaps that may change in the future? When you're back and your hold is bursting with trophies, you can find me at the Amasecus. Drinks are on me."

traits.locale_text: "İyi şans dilemek için. Uçsuz Kardeşliği ile {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Min}iş yapmamayı{/d} seçtin ancak belki de bu durum gelecekte değişir? Depoların ganimetlerle dolu bir şekilde geri döndüğünde beni Amasekus'ta bulabilirsin. İçkiler benden."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4
